txt.en: A disciplined war-band of Moria Orcs has taken up residence in one of the old armoury halls and is using it as a training hall in preparation for their next offensive against the dwarves. If you are to reach the old weapons forge within that hall and empower the infused garnet you carry, you shall have to win your way past the Orcs.
You have created an empowered garnet!
You must defeat the Orkish recruits before they are prepared to launch their offensive against the dwarves and defeat the Uruk who is overseeing their training.
Use the ancient forge to empower your infused garnet.
